title: My dog, Lloyd. Richard Bush Fashion
author: jonathanlawley

comments.content: I think it's a Larabie or a Chank...let me look...
Well, I guess not, after all...

You can get a similar look, but a little rougher, with Berliner Grotesk.   
   
 [http://www.bertholdtypes.com/bq\_library/90048.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826172445/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/90048.html)
